channel.title: Lots of bugs in a 562 NEED HELP!
channel.description: OK this is my first 562 based server and it had a shit ton of bugs. My friend fixed it A.K.A hes the owner, I am the Co Owner Ok so 562 sources are real different from 317 sources I has no .CFGs at all and trade doesnt work. So we cant add bonuses toweapons or lower bonuses. So can anyone help with what might be the problem..? Basically i need to know how to change weapon bonuses and how to make trade work cause whenever someone trades me it says (my name) wishes to trade with me and when i click it it says unable to find player. HELP PLEASEEE!

item.title: Lots of bugs in a 562 NEED HELP!
item.dc:creator: @lolmaster455 lolmaster455
item.description:
@lolmaster455 wrote:

[quote=“ljay wilson, post:15, topic:323600”]i dont know how
so…
theres compilers they say:
combat
content
io
model
net
packetbuilder
packethandler
QQQQQ
script
skills
tools
util.
Thats what they say.[/quote]

thats an atomic based source,
you habe to go src,
then click trough maps,
then go files you want to edit,
e.g.
if you want to change the [SERVER] things go to

src > com > rs2hd > model > player.java > search for [SERVER] (case sensitive)
and change the message to what you want,
then go to the compiling stuff,

then double click Model

if compiling doesnt work,
download newest java/jdk,
and fill in the version in your compiler:
mine is (from model):

@echo off title Model Compiler (Secret-PKz) echo Compiling Net "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/model/*.java echo Complete. pause

when you compiled restart/start your server.

Congratz you changed to [SERVER]: messages. ^^

i hope i helped you with this, if you need any further help
add my msn angelsinsky@hotmail.com

Read full topic

item.source: Lots of bugs in a 562 NEED HELP!

item.title: Lots of bugs in a 562 NEED HELP!
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“ljay wilson, post:9, topic:323600”]Ok but isn iClarity a 508 source?
This is 562.
Also it has like 8 compiles all named different things is there i way to make all of those into a universal compiler?[/quote]

iClarity is a 508 source, but previous versions are also 317.

@echo off cd ../src echo Compiling com.iClarity "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_[b]version here[/b]\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./[b]com/iClarity/[/b]*.java pause

Replace bolded parts with your server stuff.
So if you’re tree is like this

ServerName(3 files) - Com, Cmd, Src - Com(GameEngine) or Com(iClarity)

You would replace the bold with com/GameEngine/

Read full topic

This is 562.
Also it has like 8 compiles all named different things is there i way to make all of those into a universal compiler?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2010, 02:03:07 pm[/size][hr]Anyone help…?
I really need help bad.

item.title: Lots of bugs in a 562 NEED HELP!
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

When you compile .java’s (correctly) they become .class files.

I use iClarity, so when I make .java files, in my SRC folder, they automatically become .class files in the COM folder

item.title: Lots of bugs in a 562 NEED HELP!
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“ljay wilson, post:5, topic:323600”]wow…
But theres no places to put them
We tried doing that with the .CFGs na dit was an epic fail.
soooo…
Any tips?[/quote]

When making .cfgs, ect.

You need to make Arrays, so it passed over to the .cfg

Then you need to make .java’s that load the .cfg and handle the .cfg

item.title: Lots of bugs in a 562 NEED HELP!
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“ljay wilson, post:3, topic:323600”]OK…
That didn’t help me whatsoever so tell me how do i “hardcode”…?[/quote]
“Hardcoding” means you code the server from scratch, meaning, you make your own public booleans, ints, voids, static ints, booleans, voids, switches, cases, ect.

Read full topic
